document_data.name: Glue Powder
document_data.mainbody: '''Glue powder''' was a powerful adhesive powdered substance, used in the city-state of [[Sumbria]] of the [[Blade Kingdoms]].
document_data.Usage: Glue powder powder was often sprinkled on top of battlments of structures as a thivery deterrent and a trap.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1217}}, glue powder was used by [[House Toporello]] to secure thieir [[Toporello family palace|family palace]] after a slew of [[gem]] and jewelry burglaries that shook Sumbria. The powder saw placed on the top of the hollow-square-spaped palace to trap the infamous cat-burglar. However glue powder was easily avoided by the culprit - the kleptomanic [[firebird]] [[Tekorriikii]] - "the handsomest and smartest of all the birds."
